name: DartPad Workshop: add type-safety to Firestore usi
shortDescription: Adding type-safety to our Dart code prevents many exceptions. This's a guided DartPad workshop that will give you insights into how to use converters to write safe Firestore queries in Flutter.
longDescription: Adding type-safety to our Dart code prevents many exceptions. This's a guided DartPad workshop that will give you insights into how to use converters to write safe Firestore queries in Flutter.
